column5: 2015. beloved wife of robert. loving mother of dana dombrowski (michael) and bryan. cherished grandmother of madison and avery dearest sister of 7. loved by many nieces and nephews. visitation sunday
column6: 7-930pm and monday 2-4 and 7-930pm at c. s. bartholomew and son
column10: 9:45 a. m. a st. barnabas r. c. church
column11: bellmore. interment at calverton national cemetery in lieu of flowers
column12: donations to the lustgarten foundation for pancreatic cancer research.
